attributes.action: No to a second referendum for EU
attributes.additional_details:
After initial shocks, the British markets are on their way to recovery along with the GBP which, despite the scaremongering, will happen. The LAST thing the British economy needs is yet another period of uncertainty, more scaremongering, more internal criticism of our own economy.
We must now move on as an independent nation state, free to represent itself on the world stage in the manner that it deserves.
NO TO A SECOND REFERENDU
attributes.background:
On the 23rd of June 2016 the British people finally had the opportunity to choose to leave the EU. 
This petition is to object to any further referendum.
